article_title: Alarm in Israel at reports of possible ICC legal action over Gaza
sentence: Mr  Khan  said  the  7  October  attacks  -  in  which  Hamas-led  gunmen  killed  about  1,200  people,  mostly  civilians,  and  seized  253  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  tallies  -  represented  "some  of  the  most  serious  international  crimes  that  shock  the  conscience  of  humanity,  crimes  which  the  ICC  was  established  to  address".

article_title: Alarm in Israel at reports of possible ICC legal action over Gaza
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  the  territory  says  more  than  34,500  people  have  been  killed  there  since  the  war  began,  and  that  many  of  that  number  are  children.
